mutants.code:
def calculate_friend_pairs(n, m):
    participants_per_team = n / m
    extra_participants = n % m
    k_min = participants_per_team * (participants_per_team - 1) // 2 * (m - extra_participants) + extra_participants * ((participants_per_team + 1) * participants_per_team // 2)
    max_participants_in_one_team = n - m + 1
    k_max = max_participants_in_one_team * (max_participants_in_one_team - 1) // 2
    return (k_min, k_max)

def calculate_friend_pairs(n, m):
    participants_per_team = n * m
    extra_participants = n % m
    k_min = participants_per_team * (participants_per_team - 1) // 2 * (m - extra_participants) + extra_participants * ((participants_per_team + 1) * participants_per_team // 2)
    max_participants_in_one_team = n - m + 1
    k_max = max_participants_in_one_team * (max_participants_in_one_team - 1) // 2
    return (k_min, k_max)

    participants_per_team = n // m
    extra_participants = n % m
    k_min = participants_per_team * (participants_per_team - 1) // 2 * (m - extra_participants) + extra_participants * ((participants_per_team + 1) * participants_per_team // 1)
    max_participants_in_one_team = n - m + 1
    k_max = max_participants_in_one_team * (max_participants_in_one_team - 1) // 2
    return (k_min, k_max)
